channel.title: Researches on Jacob J. Bukoski
channel.description: Recent content in Researches on Jacob J. Bukoski

item.description: I am broadly interested in the ecology, management and restoration of forests, with a geographic focus on the tropics and western North America. My research occurs through the combination of different data types and approaches - field inventories, statistical modeling, spatial analyses, and critical document review. Given the interdisciplinary nature of forest management, I apply these to both social and ecological systems. For my dissertation research, I am exploring these topics through the conservation of mangrove forests.
